text:
FreshWorks is a people first
AI service software company.
So we have products like Freshdesk
and Freshservice, which supports the
needs of the customers.

So we don't want to worry
about infrastructure or scale
or scale or any of these,

and that's where AWS gives
us the power to run at scale
and build applications

that can be deployed
seamlessly across regions.

We don't have to think about
security, we don't have

to think about local
compliance, any of those.

We are leveraging a
lot of the services- RDS

OpenSearch, SageMaker, some
of the Bedrock stuff for us
to interface with all the LLMs.

FreshWorks has built a
lot of solutions on AWS.

The Freshdesk product, which
has been around the market

for over 14 years, has
been natively on AWS.

That was serving the needs
of the customers who need

to have helped us, support
for their consumers.

And then we, we later pivoted
to using Freshservice,

which is a product for IT
enterprises, for IT teams.
We running across 120 countries.

We have 70,000 plus
customers using a product,

some in the small and
medium business space,
and a lot of them are enterprises.
AWS is giving us the scale

and infrastructure as well as
all the services that we need

to build our applications and
run our applications at scale.
